results.title: Far Right Plans Its Next Moves With a New Energy
results.abstract: Some white supremacists and right-wing extremists were making arrangements to appear at future marches, and others were planning to run for office.

results.title: Trump Shares, Then Deletes, Twitter Post of Train Hitting Cartoon Person Covered by CNN Logo
results.abstract: Days after a driver rammed into a crowd in Charlottesville, Va., the president retweets a cartoon attacking the news network.
results.byline: By EILEEN SULLIVAN and MAGGIE HABERMAN

results.title: Black Democrats Rally Behind New York Senator Amid Racial Politicking
results.abstract: Support for Andrea Stewart-Cousins, the New York Senate minority leader, comes as another racially charged remark from a charter school proponent has emerged.
